description: [APT5](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1023) has used the CLEANPULSE utility to insert command line strings into a targeted process to prevent certain log events from occurring.(Citation: Mandiant Pulse Secure Update May 2021)

external_references.description: Perez, D. et al. (2021, May 27). Re-Checking Your Pulse: Updates on Chinese APT Actors Compromising Pulse Secure VPN Devices. Retrieved February 5, 2024.
